q: back-to-back 3-pointers that gave the Pistons the lead for good and sent them to a 107-102 victory over the Golden State Warriors on Thursday night. "That really hurt my feelings, that tip," Rasheed Wallace said. You can't let that frustrate you. I missed two point-blank foul shots. I'm upset at myself about that. You can't let that one thing get you down. That's what we did, just dug deep and came up with some stops down the stretch. Richard Leonard Hamilton scored 24 points and Allen Iverson added 23 as the Pistons won for the second straight time to open their four-game road trip after losing their first two games with Allen Iverson . Asked whether he planned to stay another four years at Google to collect stock awards worth$ 100 million, Eric Schmidt said: Yes, that is my plan. Google said last month co-founder Larry Page would take over as chief executive from April 4 while Eric Schmidt would assume the role of executive chairman.
